outline:
1. to flow, distil, flow forth or down, trickle, drop
    1. (Qal)
      1. to flow
        1. streams, floods (participle)
      2. to distil
    2. (Hiphil) to cause to flow
kjv_def: distil, drop, flood, (cause to) flow(-ing), gush out, melt, pour (down), running water, stream.
strongs_def: to drip, or shed by trickling
